com.ning.billing.meter.timeline.times

Interface TimelineCoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTimelineCoder

    public interface TimelineCoder

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] combineTimelines(List<byte[]> timesList, Integer sampleCount)
      Recode and combine the list of timeline byte objects, returning a single timeline.
      byte[] compressDateTimes(List<org.joda.time.DateTime> dateTimes)
      Compress the list of DateTimes, producing the bytes of a timeline
      int countTimeBytesSamples(byte[] timeBytes)
      Return a count of the time samples in the timeline provided
      List<org.joda.time.DateTime> decompressDateTimes(byte[] compressedTimes)
      Decompress the timeline bytes argument, returning a list of DateTimes Currently only used by tests.

    • Method Detail

      • compressDateTimes

        byte[] compressDateTimes(List<org.joda.time.DateTime> dateTimes)
        Compress the list of DateTimes, producing the bytes of a timeline
        Parameters:
        dateTimes - a list of DateTimes to compress
        Returns:
        the bytes of the resulting timeline

      • decompressDateTimes

        List<org.joda.time.DateTime> decompressDateTimes(byte[] compressedTimes)
        Decompress the timeline bytes argument, returning a list of DateTimes Currently only used by tests.
        Parameters:
        compressedTimes - the timeline bytes
        Returns:
        a list of DateTimes representing the timeline times

      • combineTimelines

        byte[] combineTimelines(List<byte[]> timesList,
                      Integer sampleCount)
        Recode and combine the list of timeline byte objects, returning a single timeline. If the sampleCount is non-null and is not equal to the sum of the sample counts of the list of timelines, throw an error
        Parameters:
        timesList - a list of timeline byte arrays
        sampleCount - the expected count of samples for all timeline byte arrays
        Returns:
        the combined timeline

      • countTimeBytesSamples

        int countTimeBytesSamples(byte[] timeBytes)
        Return a count of the time samples in the timeline provided
        Parameters:
        timeBytes - the bytes of a timeline
        Returns:
        the count of samples represented in the timeline
